overview: Shipwrecked In The 80s Darby's Castle Bobby McGee Here Comes That Rainbow Best Of All Possible Worlds Help Me Make It Through The Night Casey's Last Ride Nobody Wins The Circle From Here To Forever Loving Her Was Easier The Heart Sandinista Just The Other Side Of Nowhere Jody & The Kid The Promise Sunday Morning Coming Down Silver Tongued Devil For The Good Times encores Moment Of Forever Please Don't Tell Me How The Story Ends  25 Jul 2010 Plaza de la Trinidad, Spain
title: Kris Kristofferson: Time Changes Everything
